newsitem.title: RUSSIA: Russian MOST Bank to receive $30 mln credit-bank.
newsitem.headline: Russian MOST Bank to receive $30 mln credit-bank.

text.p: One of Russia's biggest banks, MOST Bank, said on Thursday it had signed an agreement with a group of Western banks to receive a one-year $30 million syndicated credit.
The credit, priced at 4.5 percent above LIBOR, could be extended beyond one year, a MOST press release said.

NatWest Markets, which organises credits extended by National Westminster Bank, is organising the credit. German banks Bayerische Landesbank Girozentale and Bayerische Vereinsbank Ag are co-organisers.

Other participants include Republic National Bank of New York, Baden Wurttermbergische Bank, Bank Austria, Banco Central Hispano, OTP Bank, Bank Rozwoju Eksportu SA, and Magyar Kulkereskedelmi Bank RT.
